attributes.action: Restrict who can/can't vote based on academic achievement/intelligence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The right to vote should be restricted so that only people who have achieved a certain level of education and are above a certain IQ can vote. This way MP's would be able to debate and campaign more effectively knowing that issues were being fully understood by all of the voters, and that the voters are casting their votes based on a solid understanding of the issues at hand.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
